allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix build system to automatically deploy DLL dependencies

Add automatic deployment of runtime dependencies:
- Custom DLLs \(leptonica, tesseract, hunspell\) copied via qmake
- Qt DLLs, plugins, and resources deployed via windeployqt
- Eliminates manual DLL copying after build

Fixes #192

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update repository URLs to point to fork

Replace all references to OneMoreGres/ScreenTranslator with cdmckee107/ScreenTranslator:
- Update manifest URL for automatic updates
- Update GitHub repository links in UI
- Update translator script URLs in updates.json
- Update documentation links in README
- Update build script default download URL

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
